Class Primer3ConfigurationFactory

public class Primer3ConfigurationFactory
extends java.lang.Object

A factory that produces configurations for primer picking.

getOptimalPCRConfiguration

public static Primer3Configuration getOptimalPCRConfiguration()
Returns the primer3 configuration used for short range PCR

Returns:
the primer3 configuration used for finishing primer walks use human mispriming library -primer size: 18-30 -primer GC: 40-60 -max self complem.: 5 -max 3' self complem.: 2 -max polyX: 3

getFinPrimerWalkUnitTestConfiguration

public static Primer3Configuration getFinPrimerWalkUnitTestConfiguration()
Configuration used for running unit tests. This configuration should never change, as the unit tests rely on it. Even if the configuration becomes "unreasonable", or "unrealistic" over time, its purpose is to stay fixed so that it is possible to run unit tests reliably.

Returns:
the Primer3Configuration used in unit tests
